description: Ultra short-throw interactive business projector with 3LCD technology and WUXGA resolution, ideal for classrooms, boardrooms, and collaboration spaces.
ports: HDMI x2 (one supports MHL), VGA in/out, USB-A x2, USB-B, DVI-out, RS-232, Ethernet (LAN), Audio in/out, Sync in/out, Wireless LAN, Finger-touch interface
notes: Supports interactive touch (pen and finger), USB display (image/mouse/sound), manual keystone ±3°, and network/AV control via AMX/Crestron. Lamp life up to ~5000 h (normal) / ~10000 h (eco).

ports: 2x HDMI, 2x VGA, Composite, S-Video, USB, LAN, RS-232C
notes: Interactive ultra-short-throw. Fixed throw ratio (no optical zoom).

description: Short-throw 3LCD projector with WXGA resolution and high brightness, suitable for classrooms, meeting rooms, and collaborative spaces.
ports: HDMI x1, VGA in x2, VGA out x1, USB-A, USB-B, S-Video, Composite video, Audio in/out, RJ-45 LAN, RS-232
notes: 3LCD technology with Ultra Short Throw projection, manual zoom/focus, keystone correction ±5° horizontal & vertical, integrated speaker and network control support. Brightness and lamp life ratings per manufacturer specs.

description: Ultra short-throw interactive business projector with 3LCD technology and WXGA resolution, ideal for classrooms and collaborative spaces.
ports: HDMI x2, VGA in/out, USB-A x2, USB-B x1, LAN (RJ45), RS-232, Audio in/out, Composite video
notes: 3LCD technology with interactive touch (pen and finger), built-in 16W speaker, PJLink and network control, finger-touch interface, and long lamp life with eco mode.

description: Bright WXGA 3LCD projector with 4200 ANSI lumens and flexible connectivity, suited for meeting rooms, classrooms and collaborative spaces.
ports: HDMI x2, VGA in x2, VGA out, USB-A, USB-B, Composite, Audio in/out, RS-232, RJ-45 Ethernet
notes: Supports horizontal/vertical keystone correction ±30°, 1.6x optical zoom and network control (AMX/Crestron/Extron). Built-in 16W speaker and collaborative features like split-screen and iProjection app support.

description: 3LCD projector with bright 4000 ANSI lumens and WXGA resolution, suitable for presentations in classrooms, meeting rooms, and corporate environments.
ports: HDMI x2, VGA (D-Sub) x1, 5-BNC, S-Video x1, Composite video x1, Component video RCA x3, USB-A x2, USB-B x1, Audio in/out, RJ-45 LAN, RS-232
throw_ratio: Varies with optional lens suite (fixed and zoom lens options available)
notes: Hybrid filter reduces maintenance requirements; integrated security features; AMX Device Discovery and Crestron RoomView compatible; optional wireless module support. Discontinued model with optional lenses available for flexible installation.

description: 3LCD projector with bright 4,200 ANSI lumens and WUXGA resolution, suited for corporate presentations, classrooms, and medium-sized venues.
ports: HDMI x2, VGA (D-Sub) x1, 5-BNC x1, S-Video x1, Composite video x1, Component video RCA x3, USB-A x2, USB-B x1, Audio in/out, RJ-45 LAN, RS-232
notes: Low-maintenance design with long-life 245W UHP lamp, hybrid filter, AMX Device Discovery and Crestron RoomView™ integration, optional wireless module support, and security features. Uses optional lens suite with repeatable position recall.

description: Compact and lightweight laser LCD projector with 5,000 ANSI lumens and WUXGA resolution, designed for education, corporate, and presentation environments.
ports: HDMI x2, HDBaseT (RJ45), VGA in x2, VGA out x1, Composite video, USB, Audio in/out, RS-232, LAN
notes: SOLID SHINE laser light source provides up to ~20,000 hrs of consistent brightness without lamp replacements; features 1.6x manual zoom, V/H lens shift, keystone correction, DIGITAL LINK support, and network/AV control. Projector designed for compact installation flexibility.

ports: HDMI x 2, DisplayPort x 1, DVI-D x 1
notes: Manual entry for video wall unit.

description: 98-inch 4K UHD commercial flat panel display designed for meeting rooms, lecture theatres, and digital signage.
ports: HDMI 2.0 x 4, DisplayPort 1.2 x 1, USB-C x 1, VGA x 1, OPS Slot x 1, USB x Multiple
notes: Commercial-grade 24/7 display. Supports RS-232 and LAN control, OPS expansion, and Crestron Connected.

notes: Commercial-grade 24/7 display. Supports RS-232 and LAN control, OPS expansion, and Crestron Connected.
